column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The waitress came back around again and I asked her to speak with the manager again
column4: is there something wrong with the check?" to which I replied
column5: "Yes. The fact that there is one." She looked confused and ran off to grab the same unhelpful manager from earlier
column6: who also appeared confused as to what additional problems there could be. Was it really that surprising? Really?!?!?
